name: nexus-cv-parser-lambda
description: AWS Lambda function for CV parsing with OpenAI

scripts.deploy: npm run package && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name nexus-cv-parser --zip-file fileb://cv-parser.zip
scripts.create: aws lambda create-function --function-name nexus-cv-parser --runtime nodejs18.x --role arn:aws:iam::YOUR_ACCOUNT:role/lambda-execution-role --handler index.handler --zip-file fileb://cv-parser.zip --timeout 900 --memory-size 1024
